description: Details submitted pursuant to 25/00191/FUL for Sustainable Drainage Strategy (3) in respect of the redevelopment of site by the erection of a detached 2-storey dwelling house together with the change of use of the existing building  Class C3 (dwelling house) to Use Class C4 (HMO-house in multiple occupation).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Sufficient information has been provided to demonstrate compliance with the stated condition. It is therefore recommended that Condition 3 (SUDS) pursuant to planning application ref: 25/00191/FUL for the erection of a detached 2-storey dwelling house together with the change of use of the existing building  Class C3 (dwelling house) to Use Class C4 (HMO-house in multiple occupation) dated 09.05.2025 is GRANTED.
